claim: Jeff Goldblum has received nominations for anything except an Oscar.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Jeffrey Lynn Goldblum  (  -LSB- ˈɡoʊldbluːm -RSB- born October 22 , 1952  )  is an American actor who has received nominations for an Oscar , an Emmy , a Genie and a Drama Desk Award throughout his career and is best known for starring in the highest-grossing films of his era , Jurassic Park  (  1993  )  and Independence Day  (  1996  )  , as well as their respective sequels , The Lost World : Jurassic Park  (  1997  )  , Independence Day : Resurgence  (  2016  )  , and Jurassic World 2  (  2018  )  .
